dialog.ai_chat_notice: AI chat be being activated. Please note that each NPC has a unique background and personality traits, and can access some game data. In multiplayer games, when multiple players interact with th' same NPC simultaneously, th' system will automatically isolate th' conversation context to ensure each player gets an independent interaction experience, thus optimizing resource usage. Procedural dialogues will not be read by th' AI, and ye can continue previous conversations when interacting with th' NPC again.
dialog.ai_chat_warning: AI chat be activated. Thar she blows! In multiplayer environments, each player needs to configure their API key independently, any related data will be securely stored on local devices and not uploaded to th' server. For data security, it be recommended to avoid using this feature in untrusted server environments to prevent API key leakage risks.
dialog.negotiate_warning: Negotiation mode be under development, stay tuned.
dialog.trade_warning: Trade feature be under development, stay tuned.
dialog.invalid_response: Invalid AI response: Key fields missing, please check th' console for th' API output.
dialog.no_ai_settings: Nay valid AI configuration detected, please go to th' AI settings panel to initialize.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.text: Just a few steps to enable voice service in GarryLord. 1. Log into Github, search and find th' garrylord-voice-service project. 2. Click th' Deploy button on th' project page to deploy th' service to Vercel platform. 3. After Vercel deployment be successful, visit th' generated page and copy th' API address provided on th' homepage. Batten down the hatches! 4. Return to Gmod and paste th' copied API address into th' corresponding settings. Blow me down! Now ye can freely use th' voice service in Gmod, enjoying a generous 100G monthly bandwidth!
